caption: A dog is running around the tree.
A dog is running around the tree.
A golden retriever running in circles around an ancient oak tree, autumn leaves falling. The turtle is with its greenish-brown shell.

The video shows a soccer game in progress. One player in a blue jersey is seen dribbling the ball down the field, while players in yellow jerseys attempt to defend. The player in blue successfully maneuvers past the defenders and takes a shot on goal. The goalkeeper, dressed in green, dives to his right but fails to stop the ball, which goes into the net. The player in blue is then seen celebrating his goal.
